data.name: Cast Ashore
data.detailed_description:
Join the discord server down below to playtest the game before the release, for free!

Cast Ashore is a survival-based exploration game that is set in a remote archipelago in the Pacific Ocean. Explore the vast open world and survive by gathering food and resources.

Collect Resources. Craft. Survive.



It's the year 2062. You're an aerospace engineer aboard the Fusion Voyager headed for Mars when a critical failure compromises the mission. You are the only survivor of the crash. Scavenge resources and food while trying to stay alive. Craft tools and weapons which will help you to explore the archipelago.

Build structures




With plenty of structures to choose from, build your very own home on an island or even on a raft. From the basic palm fronds shelter to a fully established wooden or metal base with everything you need to survive.

Navigate the Open Ocean in Search of Answers




Why has such a well planned and calculated mission to Mars resulted in a catastrophe? How come nobody has come looking for survivors? Search the ocean for answers all across the archipelago.

Explore the Archipelago




Construct a raft from the resources you find and set sail to explore. Improve your raft by building everything you might need to survive on it.

About the Development


Cast Ashore is being developed by Unanchored Studios, a one-man indie studio. Music and SFX are made by Haakon Davidsen. Join the Cast Ashore discord server to keep up-to-date with any new features or updates about the development.

data.short_description: Aboard the Fusion Voyager rocket originally set for Mars, you find yourself in a state of panic as you scramble to save what is left of the mission. Your efforts were unsuccessful and you are now the sole survivor of the crash which left you somewhere in the pacific ocean. Survive. Build. Explore.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Dutch
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: X64 Dual Core CPU 2.3GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: X64 Quad Core CPU 3.0GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
